sentences.sContent: And so, a lot of people see this as a sort of … or create a scenario, an Orwellian scenario, a Big Brother type scenario but I don't concur.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so, a lot of people see this as a sort of … or create a scenario, an Orwellian scenario, a Big Brother type scenario but I don't concur.
sentences.sCn: 所以，大多数人会把这个现象视为一种……或者说创作一幕剧情，一幕奥威尔式或是“老大哥”式的剧情，但是我并不同意这样的看法。

words.tran: 并发的；一致的；同时发生的
[数] 共点；同时发生的事件
一致；合作；同时发生（concur的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to agree with someone or have the same opinion as them
